entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,056Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 365

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: we're all reaching out to find another hand
entry.summary:
Author: soter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,422Chapters: 6/18Kudos: 85

Summary: “I know you’re a meta,” you blurt. Jason stares. “What.” “I saw your hand—I saw the cut and the blood, but then, it was healed, somehow, right, and like, I know I wasn’t supposed to see that and then I felt really bad about it and I wanted to let you know that I know but I didn’t want you to think I was going to, like, blackmail you—” “Blackmail me?” “Of course not,” you quickly say. “Never. No. That’s horrible. Can you imagine what would happen if it got out?” You wince. “Sorry, stupid question, you probably have.”or in which you discover that your neighbor, Jason Todd, is a metahuman, try to compensate, and things get a little... weird.

entry.title: The Knight and the Betrothed
entry.summary:
Author: anastasia1513

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,069Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 9

Summary: You’ve always known you would one day leave the Kingdom of Gotham. It was decided long before you could walk—when you were but a swaddled infant in Queen Martha’s arms, and a solemn promise was inked in royal blood between two thrones. You were to be wed to Prince Jason of Blüdhaven, the second-born son of King Thomas’s oldest ally. The pact sealed peace between the two lands, a unity your parents celebrated every year with music and light. But that was long ago. Prince Jason died young.

entry.title: Baby’s First Creature-Feature
entry.summary:
Author: TheGoldenPath

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,708Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 10

Summary: She’s reading to him, a generator manual that looks well read. The pages are yellow and water stained around her long fingers. His vision lazily trails from the book to his bloodied sheets and back to the stranger. Is he hallucinating a comforting presence to make his reality less burdensome? When had his visions ever been pleasant?A pretty girl to sit by his bedside and comfort him in his death. It reminds him of the soft moments of peace in his childhood that he held onto with a white knuckled grip. It reminds him of the few moments his mother felt like a mother. He tries to reach out and touch her hand, just to see if she’s a fantasy meant to remind him of everything he never fully had only for the pain to jolt up his entire abdomen. That works too. He manages to stifle the pained groan that wants to shoot out from the simple motion.   Lightly inspired by the myth of Circe in the odyssey. (Lightly)

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 732,542Chapters: 96/?Kudos: 769

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I’ve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol

entry.title: The Pizza Delivery Girl's Survival Guide to Gotham City
entry.summary:
Author: Morveren

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 162,468Chapters: 25/35Kudos: 9,303

Summary: People who lived outside of Gotham City would most often think of it in terms of its heroes and villains. About Batman and Robin, Joker and Harley Quinn.People who actually live in Gotham City would only think of one thing: surviving.Who cares about the people in costumes when your house has been bombed for the fifth time, or your wife has been taken hostage just because she worked in a bank?Or, in your case, when you have to make regular deliveries to places where even Batman feared to tread? Because let's face it. In a world full of superheroes and costumed villains, the real heroes are the ones who make sure that people get their pizzas in forty-five minutes or less.
